data.hoverCardHovered: A boolean value that will show or hide the card.
data.hoverCardDelay: When the user hovers, how long (in milliseconds) should the hover card be shown
data.hoverCardLeaveDelay: When the users mouse leaves, how long (in milliseconds) should the hover card be hidden
data.hoverCardTimout: The timeout for the hover event, leave this set to null.
data.hoverCardLeaveTimeout: The timeout for the mouse leave event, leave this set to null.
data.hoverCardEnter(): The method that handles the hover event.
data.hoverCardLeave(): The method that handles the mouse leave event.
